title: I Technically Started The 3rd Largest Religion In The Country
description: In this video, Max Fosh explores how he technically started the 3rd largest religion in the country through a bureaucratic loophole.
summary: Max Fosh discovers a bureaucratic loophole that allows him to technically start the 3rd largest religion in the country.
payoff: The comedic twist comes from the absurdity of starting a religion through a loophole in the system, showcasing Max's wit and creativity.
